articles.title: Century! A litre of petrol now costs ₹100 in Delhi, diesel at ₹89 - India Today
articles.description: According to the IOCL, a single litre of petrol now costs more than Rs 100 in Delhi. At the same time, the price of diesel has been raised to Rs 89 per litre.
